thread.section_title: Courtyard New York Manhattan/Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good hotel and location
thread.title_full: Good hotel and location - Review of Courtyard New York Manhattan/Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: DJC777
title: Good hotel and location
text: On arrival we received a warm welcome and we're then told they had no room for us that night. However they had arranged for us to stay just around the corner for one night at no cost and refunded one nights room cost. With complimentary drinks in the bar until the room was ready the situation was very well handled. Once settled in our correct room, we found everything clean and tidy. The hotels food options are very limited, but as you are right in the heart on NYC that's no problem and allowed us to sample breakfast, lunch and dinner in nearby venues. The central location means this is a good hotel for exploring NYC.
